text: One year since the start of the civil war in Sudan, and the situation only seems to be worsening. The conflict has spread beyond Darfur, leaving countless civilians suffering and on the brink of famine. It's heartbreaking to see such a dire humanitarian crisis receive limited attention, especially when other global conflicts dominate headlines. Let's not forget the immense struggles facing Sudan, and let's work towards finding solutions to alleviate their suffering.
